works.title: Speech Source Tracking Based on Distributed Particle Filter in Reverberant Environments
abstract: In reverberant and noisy environments, tracking a speech source in distributed microphone networks is a challenging problem. A speech source tracking method based on distributed particle filter (DPF) and average consensus algorithm (ACA) is proposed in distributed microphone networks. The generalized cross-correlation (GCC) function is used to appr...

works.title: LFM Signal Analysis Based on Improved Lv Distribution
abstract: In this paper, we propose a parameter estimation method named improved Lv distribution (ImLVD) for linear frequency modulated (LFM) signals. In this method, based on the scaling principle, we present a two-scale estimation strategy to acquire low computational cost. The two-scale estimation strategy includes coarse estimation operation and fine est...

works.title: Speech Source Tracking based on Particle Filter under non-Gaussian Noise and Reverberant Environments
BDS/GPS combined navigation receiver autonomous integrity monitoring algorithm
abstract: In order to make receiver autonomous integrity monitoring (RAIM) technique be applied to approach with vertical guidance (APV) flight phase in civil aviation navigation, the BDS/GPS combined navigation RAIM algorithm is studied. An algorithm based on the optimal weighted average solution of BDS/GPS position solution is proposed. Combined with the r...

works.title: Effectiveness analysis of complex network edge attack strategy with cost
abstract: To solve the problem that the attack cost of edges is not taken into account in the study of existing complex network edge attack, a cost-based edge attack model for complex network is proposed. The model considers the edge's attack cost. It uses edge's weight to approximately measure the attack cost. The giant connected component and the average p...

works.title: Implementation of Direction Finding Processor Based on the Novel DOA Estimation with Channel Mismatch Self-calibration
abstract: In order to solve the problem that the channel gain-phase mismatch would deteriorate the performance of direction of arrival (DOA) estimation in actual direction finding (DF) system, a novel efficient gain-phase calibration algorithm based on the self-checking signal is proposed in this paper. By injecting a self-checking signal into the actual DF...

works.title: Computationally Efficient 2D DOA Estimation for Cylindrical Conformal Array
abstract: A computationally efficient two-dimensional (2D) direction of arrival (DOA) estimation method based on cylindrical conformal antenna array is investigated in this paper. By dividing the entire array into several sub-arrays and transforming every sub-array to virtual uniform rectangular array (URA) via interpolation technique, the generalization pro...

works.title: Tensor 2D DOA Estimation for a Cylindrical Conformal Antenna Array in a Massive MIMO System under Unknown Mutual Coupling
abstract: In this paper, a novel 2D direction of arrival (DOA) estimation approach based on the tensor technique is proposed for a conformal array in a massive multiple-input-multiple-output (MIMO) system under unknown mutual coupling. By placing sensors uniformly on the cylindrical surface, the received signal expression is formulated with the Khatri-Rao (K...

works.title: Fault Detection and Isolation in GPS Receiver Autonomous Integrity Monitoring based on Chaos Particle Swarm Optimization-Particle Filter Algorithm
abstract: The receiver autonomous integrity monitoring (RAIM) is one of the most important parts in an avionic navigation system. Two problems need to be addressed to improve this system, namely, the degeneracy phenomenon and lack of samples for the standard particle filter (PF). However, the number of samples cannot adequately express the real distribution...

works.title: A novel 2D DOA estimation via tensor modeling for cylindrical conformal array
Weighted Least Squared Approach to Fault Detection and Isolation for GPS Integrity Monitoring
abstract: Reliability of a global navigation satellite system is one of great importance for global navigation purposes. Therefore, an integrity monitoring system is an inseparable part of aviation navigation system. Failures or faults due to malfunctions in the systems should be detected to keep the integrity of the system intact. In order to solve the prob...

works.title: Prenatal exposure to ambient air pollution and congenital heart disease: A Meta-analysis
abstract: Objective: To explore the association between exposure to ambient air pollution during pregnancy and congenital heart disease so as to provide evidence for primary prevention of congenital heart disease. Methods: Epidemiologic studies on ambient air pollution and congenital heart diseases were reviewed. Summary risk estimates were calculated at hig...

works.title: GNSS constellation availability evaluation method based on Markov chain
abstract: The constellation availability of satellite navigation system is one of the important indexes when evaluating the satellite navigation system performance. The satellite availability model based on Markov chain is set up, and the satellite failure rate and repair rate are taken into account in the model. Moreover, the signal-in-space (SIS) and servi...

works.title: Target DOA Estimation Using Nonuniform Sparse Array for Low Frequency Radar
Receiver autonomous integrity monitoring based on particle swarm optimization particle filter
abstract: Receiver autonomous integrity monitoring(RAIM) is an inseparable part of aviation satellite navigation receiver. Failures or faults due to malfunctions in the global navigation satellite system(GNSS) should be detected and isolated to keep the integrity of the GNSS intact. Because measurement noise does not follow the Gaussian distribution perfectl...

works.title: Improved particle filter algorithm based on chaos particle swarm optimization
abstract: To solve the degeneracy phenomenon and the sample impoverishment problem of basic particle filter (PF) algorithm, which makes the particles of PF algorithm unable to express the real distribution of probability density function, a novel PF algorithm based on chaos particle swarm was proposed. Chaos sequence was adopted in this proposed algorithm. T...

works.title: A RARE Algorithm for 2D DOA Estimation Based on Nested Array in Massive MIMO System
abstract: In this paper, a low computational complexity rank reduce (RARE) algorithm based on two dimension (2D) nested array is proposed for direction of arrival (DOA) estimation in massive multiple-input multiple-output (MIMO) system. By utilizing the difference co-array of the 2D nested array, one can obtain O(N 2) virtual sensors with only N actual senso...

works.title: A Fast Modified DOA Estimation Algorithm with Rotation Array for Vehicle Security in Intelligent Transportation System
Real-time ultra-wideband direction finding for the conformal array antenna
abstract: In order to solve the problem concerning the ultra-wideband direction finding for the conformal array antenna on an airborne system, a real-time arbitrary baseline direction finding algorithm based on the conformal array antenna has been proposed. This algorithm provides unambiguous direction finding using the rotation comparison method. The arbitr...

works.title: Research of multi-path routing based on network coding in space information networks
abstract: A multi-path routing algorithm based on network coding is proposed for combating long propagation delay and high bit error rate of space information networks. On the basis of traditional multi-path routing, the algorithm uses a random linear network coding strategy to code data packets. Code number is determined by the next hop link status and the...

works.title: A Novel DOA Estimation Algorithm Using Array Rotation Technique
abstract: The performance of traditional direction of arrival (DOA) estimation algorithm based on uniform circular array (UCA) is constrained by the array aperture. Furthermore, the array requires more antenna elements than targets, which will increase the size and weight of the device and cause higher energy loss. In order to solve these issues, a novel low...

works.title: A source number estimation method based on total least squares fitting
abstract: The color noise will lead to performance degradation of the most source number estimation methods. Focus on this problem, a novel source number detection method used in colored noise is proposed in this paper. First, the method is based on eigen-decomposition of array covariance matrix and then sorts the eigenvalues in descending order. Though a st...

works.title: New DOA algorithm using subspace projection and synthetic spatial spectrum
abstract: In this paper, we propose a new direction of arrival (DOA) estimator for sensor-array processing. The estimator we propose is a modified weighted noise subspace of MUSIC algorithm (MWNSM). The algorithm is to solve the problem that the MUSIC algorithm has a strong depends on the signal-to-noise ratio (SNR) and snapshots. The new method reconstructs...

works.title: Direction-of-arrival estimation for improving resolution performance of spatial spectrum algorithm
abstract: Resolution of the multiple signal classification (MUSIC) algorithm decreases under severe environments such as low SNR, small number of snapshots, and incidence from close angles. To deal with the problem, a modified high-resolution direction-of-arrival (DOA) estimation method is proposed. The algorithm makes full use of information contained in th...

works.title: Novel high-resolution DOA estimation using subspace projection method
abstract: The performance of multiple signal classification (MUSIC) algorithm with regard to solving closely spaced direction of arrivals (DOAs) depends strongly upon the signal-to-noise ratio (SNR) and snapshots. In order to solve this problem, a method by reconstructing the spatial spectrum function with both noise subspace and signal subspace is presented...

works.title: New Algorithm for DOA Estimation with Low SNR
abstract: The resolution performance of Multiple Signal Classification (MUSIC) algorithm decreases under non ideal scenario like low SNR, small number of snapshots, or incident waves from close angles. In order to solve this problem, a new method which takes use of the full information in the vectors and eigenvalues of the array correlation matrix is propose...

works.title: Algorithm for DOA estimation using second derivative of spectrum
abstract: Although the multiple signal classification (MUSIC) algorithm which is based on the concept of subspace has excellent performance, the resolution ability decreases in direction of arrival (DOA) estimation under severe environments like low signal noise ratio (SNR), small number of snapshots, or incident waves from close angles. Focusing on this pro...
